question: "Who in the wild west was known as ""Iron Eyes"" among his other nicknames?"
api_result: The person in the Wild West who was known as "Iron Eyes" among his other nicknames was Wyatt Earp. Wyatt Earp is a legendary figure in the American Old West, best known for his role as a lawman and his participation in the famous gunfight at the O.K. Corral in Tombstone, Arizona. His other nicknames included "Old Iron Eyes" and "The Fighting Deputy."
